title: The owner shall establish effective sewage disposal and recycling system during the construction and operational phase of the development
clause_text: The owner shall establish effective sewage disposal and recycling system during the construction and operational phase of the development. No sewage shall be allowed to be discharged into natural stream.
section: The norms for buildings shall be as follows -

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
